comment: Very cut and dry. The quizzes are online which is great but theyre pretty difficult. Shes intimidating and not approachable. The tests are tough.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Henry expects you to come to class prepared and ready to participate. If you don't do this, class will be very unenjoyable and she will refuse to elaborate on material for not putting the work in that you should be. Her class is easy enough if you read, show up, do the quizzes, and study for the tests. Not my favorite, but she's fine.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: She gives higher grades to the women, I started to notice that when I worked with a group of girls and guys in the class on 2 assignments together and all the girls got 5-10 points higher than the guys and we all had similar or the same answers. She isn't good at explaining concepts and uses bad examples. She does have group work, online quizzes.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.
